title: Gordon Ramsay leaves fans swooning over his shredded body in sexy topless snap
text:

Gordon Ramsay left his followers swooning as he showed off his rippling muscles in a topless snap.

The sexy TV chef wowed fans as he posed up on the beach in nothing but his running shorts and trainers.

Recently, the 52-year-old has got as much attention for his hot bod as he has for his sweary kitchen outburts.

And this latest snap certainly got people's attention.

Sharing it on Instagram , the dad-of-five said: "Wishing all the athletes the very best of luck for #kona @ironmantri today , crossing the line for me was one of the most exciting feeling ever !"

But the Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares star's fans were way more interested in him.

(Image: Instagram)

One said: "Gordon out here looking more shredded than the meat he slices"

Another told him: "chef you're so sexy..."

"Hello hottie," another commented.

And one said: "Looking mighty fine Mr Ramsey"

(Image: Doug Peters/EMPICS Entertainment)

It's not just Gordon who's been getting attention lately.

Fans are also besotted with his baby son Oscar.

The six-month-old recently had his very first haircut, and pulled the kind of disgruntled face his dad regularly makes on TV.

Gordon shared the snap online, saying: "Not happy having my first haircut! After 3 BAFTAs and one Emmy... finally we have won an Oscar."

Gordon and his wife Tana, 44, welcomed Oscar, their fifth child on April 4 this year.

The couple already have four older children, Megan, 21, twins Jack and Holly, 19, and Tilly, 17.
